name: 6th Dimension
summary: You have been dropped into the 6th dimension. Let's hope you can make it back to reality.

name: 6 Takes!
summary: 6 Takes! - Wolfgang Kramer's ingeniously simple card game with "bullheads". The aim of the game is to avoid getting cards. The player with the fewest bullheads at the end of the game is the winner. It sounds easier than it is, players will need some great tactics and perhaps a little luck.

name: 6th Floor
summary: Explore a seemingly endless hotel floor where each identical corridor challenges your perception. This horror walking simulator tests your observation skills as you seek the emergency exit.
